text: Munofiqon ʙim dorand, ki [maʙodo] surae dar ʙorai onon [ʙar pajomʙar] nozil savad va onon [ mu'minon]-ro az onci dar dilhoi eson [munofiqon] ast, ogoh sozad. [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: «[Harci mexohed] Masxara kuned, [ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo onciro, ki [az on meparhezed va] haros dored, ifso xohad kard»
